page.title: 03Housing Development
page.content: Several of the old shops that used to be in the village have closed down during the last twenty years.No one wished to reopen them so the council bought them and changed them into flats. These flats are rented to one parent families or to people who have family problems. A small row of twelve new houses has been built in Commercial Buildings by the{Family {Care Housing Association}and these are also rented to families who have social problems. A few new private houses have been built in Cwmfelinfach in the last ten years.The new houses have all been built on the side of the mountain because there is no room to build in the valley itself.Nearly all of these new houses are bungalows built from bricks.Most of them are detached.
